verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass in <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> that they <S%G1525>went<s%> both <S%G2596>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2980>spoke,<s%> that a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G4100>believed.<s%>

But the <S%G544>unbelieving<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1892>stirred<s%> up the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and <S%G2559>made<s%> their <S%G5590>minds<s%> <S%G2559>evil<s%> <S%G2559>affected<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G2425>Long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1304>stayed<s%> they speaking <S%G3955>boldly<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3140>gave<s%> <S%G3140>testimony<s%> to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of his <S%G5485>grace,<s%> and <S%G1325>granted<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders<s%> to be <S%G1096>done<s%> by their <S%G5495>hands.<s%>
But the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4977>divided:<s%> and part <S%G2258>held<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and part with the <S%G652>apostles.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> there was an <S%G3730>assault<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and also of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> with their <S%G758>rulers,<s%> to <S%G5195>use<s%> them <S%G5195>spitefully,<s%> and to <S%G3036>stone<s%> them,

They were <S%G4894>ware<s%> of it, and <S%G2703>fled<s%> to <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> and <S%G1191>Derbe,<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G3071>Lycaonia,<s%> and to the <S%G4066>region<s%> that <S%G2192>lies<s%> <S%G4066>round<s%> <S%G4066>about:<s%>
And <S%G1563>there<s%> they <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel.<s%>

And there <S%G2521>sat<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra,<s%> <S%G102>weak<s%> in his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G5560>cripple<s%> from his <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> had <S%G4043>walked:<s%>

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2980>speak:<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G816>steadfastly<s%> <S%G816>beholding<s%> him, and <S%G1492>perceiving<s%> that he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> to be <S%G4982>healed,<s%>
<S%G2036>Said<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G450>Stand<s%> <S%G3717>upright<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> your <S%G4228>feet.<s%> And he <S%G242>leaped<s%> and <S%G4043>walked.<s%>

And when the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G4160>done,<s%> they <S%G1869>lifted<s%> up their <S%G5456>voices,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> in the <S%G3072>speech<s%> of <S%G3071>Lycaonia,<s%> The <S%G2316>gods<s%> are <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to us in the <S%G3666>likeness<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>
And they <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G2203>Jupiter;<s%> and <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G2060>Mercurius,<s%> <S%G1894>because<s%> he was the <S%G2233>chief<s%> <S%G3056>speaker.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G2203>Jupiter,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4253>before<s%> their <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G5022>oxen<s%> and <S%G4725>garlands<s%> to the <S%G4440>gates,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> have done <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> with the <S%G3793>people.<s%>

Which when the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> and <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of, they <S%G1284>rent<s%> their <S%G2440>clothes,<s%> and <S%G1530>ran<s%> in <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G2896>crying<s%> out,

And <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G435>Sirs,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> you <S%G5130>these<s%> things? We <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G3663>like<s%> <S%G3663>passions<s%> with you, and <S%G2097>preach<s%> to you that you should <S%G1994>turn<s%> from <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G3152>vanities<s%> to the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> things that are <S%G1722>therein:<s%>
<S%G3739>Who<s%> in <S%G1074>times<s%> <S%G3944>past<s%> <S%G1439>suffered<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> to <S%G4198>walk<s%> in their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G3598>ways.<s%>

<S%G2544>Nevertheless<s%> he <S%G863>left<s%> not <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G267>without<s%> <S%G267>witness,<s%> in that he <S%G15>did<s%> <S%G15>good,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> us <S%G5205>rain<s%> from <S%G3771>heaven,<s%> and <S%G2593>fruitful<s%> <S%G2540>seasons,<s%> <S%G1705>filling<s%> our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> with <S%G5160>food<s%> and <S%G2167>gladness.<s%>
And with <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G3004>sayings<s%> <S%G3433>scarce<s%> <S%G2664>restrained<s%> they the <S%G3793>people,<s%> that they had not done <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> to them.

And there <S%G1904>came<s%> <S%G1904>thither<s%> certain <S%G2453>Jews<s%> from <S%G490>Antioch<s%> and <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> who <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> the <S%G3793>people,<s%> and having <S%G3034>stoned<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G4951>drew<s%> him out of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3543>supposing<s%> he had been <S%G2348>dead.<s%>

However,, as the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2944>stood<s%> <S%G2944>round<s%> <S%G2944>about<s%> him, he <S%G450>rose<s%> up, and <S%G1525>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city:<s%> and the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> he <S%G1831>departed<s%> with <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> to <S%G1191>Derbe.<s%>

And when they had <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to that <S%G4172>city,<s%> and had <S%G3100>taught<s%> <S%G2425>many,<s%> they <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G5290>again<s%> to <S%G3082>Lystra,<s%> and to <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> and <S%G490>Antioch,<s%>

<S%G1991>Confirming<s%> the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G3870>exhorting<s%> them to <S%G1696>continue<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and that we <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And when they had <S%G5500>ordained<s%> them <S%G4245>elders<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%> and had <S%G4336>prayed<s%> with <S%G3521>fasting,<s%> they <S%G3908>commended<s%> them to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G4100>believed.<s%>
And after they had <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1330>throughout<s%> <S%G4099>Pisidia,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3828>Pamphylia.<s%>
And when they had <S%G2980>preached<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> in <S%G4011>Perga,<s%> they <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G825>Attalia:<s%>

And <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G636>sailed<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> from <S%G3606>where<s%> they had been <S%G3860>recommended<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>

And when they were <S%G3854>come,<s%> and had <S%G4863>gathered<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> they <S%G312>rehearsed<s%> <S%G3745>all<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> with them, and how he had <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>
And <S%G1563>there<s%> they <S%G1304>stayed<s%> <S%G3756>long<s%> <S%G3641><s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> with the <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>
